Headline: #124 Navy Pier Temporary Westbound Reroute near Lower Wacker/Farbanks
ShortDescription: Westbound 124 Navy Pier buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand, State, Wacker and Michigan: due to, street blockage near Lower Wacker/Farbanks.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #124 Navy Pier buses are temporarily rerouted via Grand, State, Wacker and Michigan: due to, street blockage near Lower Wacker/Farbanks.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
